entity.name: MobileWormholeBorer
entity.description: A fast wormhole borer ship that will find a location to try to create a new Wormhole, then transform into the full Nephilim.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardJuno
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Generates a protective barrier around the primary hull, and repels smaller ships using its powerful knockback weaponry.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardVesta
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Generates a protective barrier around the primary hull, and emits a powerful damping field that reduces the attack power of hostile units across the entire planet.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardMinerva
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Generates a protective barrier around the primary hull, and repels smaller ships using its powerful knockback weaponry.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardCeres
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Generates a protective barrier around the primary hull, and maintains a swarm of smaller guardian-producing factories.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticCeresWard
entity.description: A sub-sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Generates a protective barrier around it's parent's hull, and produces a swarm of AI guardians.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardDiana
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Threatens the entire gravity well with it's powerful long range weaponry.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardVenus
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Converts nearby smaller vessels to AI control at a frightening rate.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardMars
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Uses a powerful beam weapon against nearby vessels, and also boosts AI ships across the entire planet.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardMercury
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. In addition to speeding up allied ships on the planet, it uses advanced stealth systems that are so well tuned it can fire it's weapons with almost no disruption of it's cloaking field.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardNeptune
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. It's Tidal Wave Missiles are devastating against structures.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardVulcan
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Mounts a powerful anti-capital ship weapon and maintains a swarm of smaller, Dire Guardian producing factories.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticVulcanWard
entity.description: A sub-sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Produces a swarm of AI Dire guardians.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticFlenserJupiterWardApollo
entity.description: A powerful sub-unit that is part of a Jupiter Pattern Israfel. Generates a protective barrier around the primary hull, and repels smaller ships using its powerful knockback weaponry.

entity.name: Custodian
entity.description: Advanced prototype of the next version of a 'Ramiel' vessel. More easily produced, but weaker than the original. Long range blasts, boosts allies on the planet, protects them with a forcefield and is invulnerable if there are Guard Posts present.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticHydraHead
entity.description: A Head spawned from a Leliel, featuring advanced corrosive weapons.

entity.name: Reanimator
entity.description: Advanced prototype of the next version of a 'Raphael' vessel. Turns enemies to its side, and releases drones to bring back fallen allies.

entity.name: Umbra
entity.description: Advanced prototype of the next version of a 'Azrael' vessel. Cloaked and very hard to reveal, capable of entirely ignoring Forcefields and personal shields.

entity.name: Shellshocker
entity.description: Advanced prototype of the next version of a 'Sachiel' vessel. Long range splash damage, which also debuffs things hit.

entity.name: ExtragalacticChimera
entity.description: Arakiel without the main guns but now firing revealed missile launchers.

entity.name: WarspiteArtillery
entity.description: Advanced prototype of the next version of a 'Arakiel Artillery' vessel. Constant, long range blasts, affects everything in the small blast radius.

entity.name: Warspite
entity.description: Was hidden inside the Turiel Artillery, and not happy.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticPhoenixV2Stage2
entity.description: Rampaging, overcharged version of a Barbiel, born from the ashes of an Unstable Barbiel. Whatever exotic technologies are involved are not exactly healthy for the ship, however.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticDireProteus
entity.description: We have previously encountered the Factoriel, which was less of a ship, and more a voracious swarm masquerading as one. This is like that. But larger. Much larger.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticDireProteusStage2
entity.description: We have previously encountered the Factoriel, which was less of a ship, and more a voracious swarm masquerading as one. This is like that. But larger. Much larger.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticDireProteusStage3
entity.description: We have previously encountered the Factoriel, which was less of a ship, and more a voracious swarm masquerading as one. This is like that. But larger. Much larger.

entity.name: LONExtragalacticDireProteusStage4
entity.description: We have previously encountered the Factoriel, which was less of a ship, and more a voracious swarm masquerading as one. This is like that. But larger. Much larger.

entity.name: Fenrir
entity.description: Advanced prototype of the next version of an 'Abatur' vessel. Has a long range fan beam capable of piercing many targets, as well as a shorter range flak battery and a set of drones.

entity.name: ExtragalacticAIHunterAnnihilator
entity.description: Vastly upgraded Seraph.

entity.name: ExtragalacticAIHunterSeeker
entity.description: Larger and more dangerous Seraph.
